page.title: 07Organisations-Winmarleigh(1)
page.content: Winmarleigh,with its scattered 250 or so people,is like many another small community ,highly organised. If one wishes one can make committees one's hobby there being some 10 such bodies at least in the parish. As covered above the Parish Council is the local body for matters temporal. The 'spiritual' equivalent is the {Parochial Church Council}of S.Luke's Parish Church.The church is in{the} {Garstang Deanery}and the{Diocese of {Blackburn.} The P.C.C. meets about once a month in the school and attempts to keep the church in Winmarleigh solvent by organising fund raising and by vetting the accounts,and, at the same time in helping the Vicar,Roger Hamblin,in the running of this part of the combined benefice.The possible further merger with Glasson is viewed with concern.
